page.description: Returns TRUE if named modeless dialog box exists.

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description:
.T. = The dialog box exists.
.F. = The dialog box does not exist.

page.discussion: The UI_MODELESS_DLG_EXIST() function indicates whether a modeless dialog box exists.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example creates a modeless dialog, then uses UI_MODELESS_DLG_EXIST()to see if it exists.
section.example: ui_modeless_dlg_box("Basic Modeless Dialog", <<%dlg% {xmargin=10} {ymargin=2} <20,2Click Here!MyButton> %dlg%, <<%code% if a_dlg_button="MyButton" ui_modeless_dlg_close("Basic Modeless Dialog") end if %code%) if (UI_MODELESS_DLG_EXIST("Basic Modeless Dialog")=.t.) then ui_msg_box("UI_MODELESS_DLG_EXIST()", "Found it!") end if
